contents:
59 Where's the fucking government on stopping the 20 fucking spam calls/texts you get every day. I don't expect much from the government, but how about kicking these pajeet faggots out of our phone system. 🔥🗑️ ️ GARBAGE PEOPLE  🗑️🔥 posted 3 hours ago by TiggerLovingPooh 3 comments award share download report block
3 comments Sort by Top Top New Worst Old Save MrMcGreenGenes 3 points 3 hours ago I forwarded my cell number to Google Voice with DND turned on last year and the calls tapered off to one every few months now. permalink award report block reply NeverNotTrump 2 points 2 hours ago Be sure to add (aggressively) to Do Not Call lists (state and federal).  While it might not cover all of the calls, it will stop a bunch of them.  Some services also support apps like NoMoRobo, which works wonderfully. permalink award report block reply turanian_552 1 points 2 hours ago End phone number spoofing and filtering junk will be much easier. permalink award report block reply
MrMcGreenGenes 3 points 3 hours ago I forwarded my cell number to Google Voice with DND turned on last year and the calls tapered off to one every few months now. permalink award report block reply
NeverNotTrump 2 points 2 hours ago Be sure to add (aggressively) to Do Not Call lists (state and federal).  While it might not cover all of the calls, it will stop a bunch of them.  Some services also support apps like NoMoRobo, which works wonderfully. permalink award report block reply
turanian_552 1 points 2 hours ago End phone number spoofing and filtering junk will be much easier. permalink award report block reply
